homepage.title: Morocco Made Real: Verified Authentic
homepage.subtitle: Technology Meets Tradition - Connecting authentic Moroccan culture with the world through verified experiences
homepage.choose_persona: Choose your role to discover how we can help you:

tourist.title: Tourist & Traveler
tourist.subtitle: Discover authentic Morocco
tourist.description: Experience Morocco's rich cultural heritage through AI-powered itineraries, verified artisan workshops, and authentic cultural immersion.
tourist.value: Get personalized recommendations that match your interests while supporting local communities and preserving traditional crafts.

artisan.title: Artisan & Craftsperson
artisan.subtitle: Document and monetize your craft
artisan.description: Transform your traditional skills into global opportunities through our comprehensive documentation process and marketplace platform.
artisan.value: Increase your income by 3x while preserving your cultural heritage and reaching international customers.

expert.title: Cultural Expert & Validator
expert.subtitle: Preserve cultural authenticity
expert.description: Use your expertise to validate traditional crafts and contribute to Morocco's cultural preservation efforts through our AI-assisted review system.
expert.value: Make a meaningful impact on cultural preservation while earning from your expertise and building your professional reputation.

government.title: Government & Tourism Board
government.subtitle: Track Vision 2030 progress
government.description: Monitor tourism metrics, artisan network growth, and cultural preservation initiatives with comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.
government.value: Real-time insights into tourism performance and cultural preservation progress to support Vision 2030 objectives.

content_team.title: Content Team & Media
content_team.subtitle: Create compelling cultural content
content_team.description: Manage multimedia production workflows for artisan journey documentation with advanced project management and asset organization tools.
content_team.value: Streamline content creation processes while capturing authentic cultural stories that resonate with global audiences.

collector.title: Collector & Investor
collector.subtitle: Invest in authentic culture
collector.description: Discover and invest in verified authentic Moroccan crafts with blockchain certification and detailed provenance documentation.
collector.value: Build a valuable collection of authentic pieces while supporting artisan communities and preserving cultural heritage.

impact.title: Our Impact on Morocco's Cultural Heritage

vision.title: Supporting Morocco's Vision 2030
vision.description: We're proud to contribute to Morocco's ambitious tourism goals through technology-enabled cultural preservation and authentic tourism experiences.

scanning.title: Scan Artisan QR Code
scanning.description: Find QR codes at workshops, souks, and cultural centers across Morocco. Each scan unlocks an authentic master artisan story.

scanning.stories_saved: Stories will be saved to your Cultural Explorer Pass
